info: Installed approximately a week after released
problem: No response when trying to add a not signed ppa repository in terminal
solution:
Add it by using software and update GUI from ubuntu in other software tab, then update from terminal with
$ sudo apt-get update --allow-unauthenticated
The extra option was necessary for not signed packages

problem: No brightness allowed without fn keys
solution:
Install brightness-controller
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:apandada1/brightness-controller
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install brightness-controller
or add power manager plugin item by doing right click on the bar below.
